Just because a paper wasn't accepted doesn't mean it isn't good! #ICA21 https://t.co/y2t6BqB8tH

On the flip side, I am 1/2 for #ICA21. Its a 50% acceptance rate, but also a 50% rejection rate. If you didn't get something in, hang in there!
